name: web-works
description: Monorepo for multiple website projects hosted on Netlify

scripts.build:project-1: cd PROJECT-1 && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:project-2: cd PROJECT-2 && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:project-3: cd PROJECT-3-DUO-main && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:project-4: cd PROJECT-4-REJOY-main && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:project-5: cd PROJECT-5-Sundown-main && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:ray-ban: cd RAY-BAN-REDESIGN-main && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:sneakers: cd Sneakers-Store-Ecommerce-main && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:tiny-todos: cd Tiny-todos-main && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd PROJECT-1 && npm install && cd ../PROJECT-2 && npm install && cd ../PROJECT-3-DUO-main && npm install && cd ../PROJECT-4-REJOY-main && npm install && cd ../PROJECT-5-Sundown-main && npm install && cd ../RAY-BAN-REDESIGN-main && npm install && cd ../Sneakers-Store-Ecommerce-main && npm install && cd ../Tiny-todos-main && npm install

author: JXLEE
